name: canvas-mcp-server
description: Connect Claude Desktop to your Canvas LMS data through the CanvasFlow Chrome extension
long_description:
Access your Canvas LMS courses, assignments, and grades directly from Claude Desktop. This MCP server connects Claude to the CanvasFlow Chrome extension, enabling natural conversations about your coursework.

Features: List courses, view assignments and due dates, check grades and submissions, get course information.

Setup: (1) Install the CanvasFlow Chrome extension, (2) Install this MCP server in Claude Desktop, (3) Click 'Refresh Canvas Data' in the extension, (4) Ask Claude about your courses!

Requires: CanvasFlow Chrome extension installed and configured.
